H0.text: Which element takes its name from the Persian for 'gold coloured'. Au

H1.text: Which element takes its name from the Persian for 'gold coloured'. Hg

H2.text: Which element takes its name from the Persian for 'gold coloured'. Ag

H3.text: Which element takes its name from the Persian for 'gold coloured'. Zr

A4.text: The name zirconium is derived from the name of the mineral zircon, the most important source of zirconium. The word is related to Persian zargun (zircon; zar-gun, 'gold-like' or 'as gold')
